subject: p19844485
History: Postmenopausal with worsening shortness of breath, question pleural effusion, vascular congestion. Comparison is made to the patients prior study of. Single portable AP chest film of at hours is submitted.
Impression: Overall cardiac enlargement and stable cardiomediastinal contours. Interval decrease in lung volumes with probable perihilar and mild pulmonary edema. No definite pleural effusions. No evidence of pneumothorax. No acute bony abnormality.
